questions.question: How do you move a reserved instance from one region to another?
choices: Shut the instance down, change its region via the console or CLI, and restart the instance
Contact your AWS billing resource to manually move the instance and its associated billing
Make a snapshot of the instance, copy the snapshot to the new region, and start the instance from the snapshot
You cannot move reserved instances across regions

questions.question: Which of the following allows you the least expensive access to compute resources?
Is the S3-IA storage class less expensive than S3?
choices: It depends on how the storage class is used

questions.question: Which EBS volume type is most appropriate for use with a large database workload?
choices: EBS with a throughput optimized HDD
EBS with a General Purpose SSD
EBS with a provisioned IOPS SSD

questions.question: Which of the following costs the least?
choices: Retrieving a file from S3 to a local desktop client
An instance retrieving data from S3 in the same region
Uploading a file to S3 from a local desktop client
An instance retrieving data from S3 in a different region

questions.question: Which of the following is not a pricing model for instances?
Which of these S3 storage classes is the most durable?
choices: All of these classes are equally durable

questions.question: Your AWS hosted application requires a minimum of 12 c1.medium instances running the Amazon Linux 2 AMI. What service allows you to implement a highly available design that would replace an instance if it failed health checks?

You are new on a project that makes heavy use of AWS. Your first priority is to reduce costs and identify security risks. What tool could you use to scan the existing environment and set initial priorities for change?

Your new online concert chat service is expected to attract 2+ million users. You have a requirement to track activity for analytics and marketing. What can you use to authenticate these users without creating an internal database?

Your EMR cluster uses S3 for data snapshots. In order to reduce costs, you want to implement a storage option that is cost effective with the trade-off of reduced availability. What is a good solution to accomplish this?
Which of the following is the least expensive EBS volume type?
Which of the following are AWS-supported solutions for encrypting data at rest when that data is objects stored in S3 buckets? (Choose two.)

You are in charge of building a business intelligence application that can handle multiple data sources and perform analytics at a large scale. Which of the following services and tools would allow you to build a cost-effective solution? (Choose two.)
Which of the following is reduced as part of AWS total cost of ownership approach?

Your online graphics processing application runs short Python applications to perform ETL functions on incoming log files stored in S3. What is the most cost-effective on-demand compute architecture to perform this function?

Your company needs a storage solution that can support millions of customers accessing billing data. The data should be instantly accessible for users, but individual bills are not accessed that often. What is the most cost-efficient storage for this use case?
Which of the following might be an area about which Trusted Advisor makes recommendations? (Choose two.)
Which of the following is not a valid payment option for reserved instances?
Which of the following are valid terms for reserved instances? (Choose two.)
